评论概述: Beautiful Jacket! But order one size up from your size
评论详情: This is a beautiful jacket for a very good price. My only warning is that the sizing is one size smaller than the ladies size in the USA. I love the jacket ... the larger size that is. It does need to be dry cleaned, but that is no problem. Customer service is good when you contact the seller through the Amazon website. I am completely satisfied.
My wife loves it and it looks great on her.  Very well crafted.
Very nice jacket, but order a size up
I bought this for Ma' Ladies birthday and she loves it. It's a lot thicker than I expected. Great deal
